text:
NAEB ENGINEERING COMMITTEE REPORTS (CONT)
No. 8 AM^-M-TV Equipment - Carl Menzer
This report covers new equipment, including the Amp ex
Videotape Recorder, displayed at the NARTB Equipment
held in Chicago, April 15-20, 1956. No attempt is
made to describe equipment which has been on the
market for some time and with which most are familiar.
Much broadcasting equipment has been covered in NAEB
Engineering Reports No. 1 and No. 7. Only equipment
believed of interest to NAEB members id described.
May, §956. §3 pp. Paper. 500
Complete Set, 7 Engineering Reports. $2.50
Test Equipment Inventory - Cecil S. Bidlack, Editor
A detailed inventory of the test equipment in use at
educational radio and television stations and production
centers including station data and listing chief engi¬
neers. February, 1957. 37 pp. Paper. $1.00
